path.style: stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(189, 184, 184); fill: none;
stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(132, 117, 119); fill: none;
stroke-width: 15; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(204, 204, 204); fill: none;
